# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  exclude tags multiple_temperature_statement.cir.pspice multiple_temperature_statement.cir multiple_temperature_statement.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/multiple_temperature_statement.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND XDM_BDL_FOUND AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/PSPICE/TEMPERATURE/multiple_temperature_statement.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} multiple_temperature_statement.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} multiple_temperature_statement.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/PSPICE/TEMPERATURE/multiple_temperature_statement.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}XDM/PSPICE/TEMPERATURE/multiple_temperature_statement.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;pspice")
endif()
